title: Go Cops
author: VD
content_html: This is the greatest song about the police since NWA’s epic anthem and actually serves to justify Kesha’s existence on the planet. There has never been a police state without police.
content_text:
This is the greatest song about the police since
NWA’s epic anthem
and actually serves to justify Kesha’s existence on the planet.  There has never been a police state without police.
